Interface L8.OnEventListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    L8

    public static interface L8.OnEventListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onEvent(int eventId, java.lang.String message, L8 l8)
      Receives event from L8 device

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        void onEvent(int eventId,
           java.lang.String message,
           L8 l8)
        Receives event from L8 device
        Parameters:
        eventId - Event type: EVENT_POWER_BUTTON_PRESSED, EVENT_LIMINOSITY_LEVEL_UP, EVENT_ROTATION, EVENT_LIMINOSITY_LEVEL_DOWN, EVENT_PROXIMITY_LEVEL_DOWN and EVENT_PROXIMITY_LEVEL_UP
        message - Extra data from each event.
        l8 - L8 device that sends events.
